Clip.Title: THE DAY KENNEDY DIED
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The doctor who tried to save him. The Secret Service agent who was seconds too late. The man wrongly accused of his murder. And the woman who unwittingly sheltered an assassin. The death of JFK has inspired thousands of books and debates over the last 50 years, but the stories of the people there on that day have gone largely untold...until now. Experience November 22, 1963 as it has never been presented before, in this minute-by-minute account of that day, narrated by Academy Award-winner Kevin Spacey, and brought to life through rarely seen footage and rarely heard testimonies.

Clip.Title: JACKIE WITHOUT JACK
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Acclaimed director Patrick Jeudy has access to a series of conversations recorded a few months after her husband's assassination in Dallas on November 22, 1963. The young widow was then 34, and she recounts the past like a novel about her dream life with her husband John Kennedy. They are conversations about history, and about her own story - including some very intimate secrets and controversial opinions.

Clip.Title: KENNEDY'S SUICIDE BOMBER
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Rare manuscripts, court documents and key eyewitnesses reveal the chilling and largely untold story of Richard Pavlick, who tried to kill President-Elect Kennedy in December 11th 1960, a month before Kennedy was sworn in as President.

Clip.Title: THE DAY KENNEDY DIED
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The doctor who tried to save him. The Secret Service agent who was seconds too late. The man wrongly accused of his murder. And the woman who unwittingly sheltered an assassin. The death of JFK has inspired thousands of books and debates over the last 50 years, but the stories of the people there on that day have gone largely untold...until now. Experience November 22, 1963 as it has never been presented before, in this minute-by-minute account of that day, narrated by Academy Award-winner Kevin Spacey, and brought to life through rarely seen footage and rarely heard testimonies.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Technology is advancing at a geometric rate. Find out how far we have come and how far our minds are going to innovate.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the remote Northern Shore of Nova Scotia, to the red mud perimetre of Prince Edward Island, the warm waters of the Northumberland Strait are the setting for an incredible aerial exploration of these coastlines.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An east coast shipper creates a private naval fleet to seize American ships.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Americans are invading and Lower Canada is undermanned, forcing Charles de Salaberry to rely on cunning tactics.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: SKY VIEW
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Soar over Europe and experience the landscape from an eagle's perspective. This remarkable series uses the latest HD and camera mount technology to give the audience a view of Europe and its history that will takes their breath away.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Isaac Brocks's daring made him a hero during the early months of the War of 1812, but it may also have been his fatal flaw.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Americans are invading and Lower Canada is undermanned, forcing Charles de Salaberry to rely on cunning tactics.

Clip.Title: THE SILK ROAD
Clip.Episode: The Flame and Cross: The South Caucasus
Clip.EpisodeSummary: 25 years after first filming the route, the original film crew returns to the region for a modern look.

Clip.Title: JEFFERSON'S SECRET BIBLE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Experts at Smithsonian Institution's National Museum of American History are trying 200 years later, to preserve Jefferson's secret bible, a book he constructed by cutting apart the New Testament to tell a chronological story of Jesus's life, parables, and moral instruction, removing all mention of miracles and the resurrection.

Clip.Title: SHACKLETON'S FROZEN HELL
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In 1914, the world's first trans-Antarctic expedition came to a cold stop. Trapped in ice just 60 miles from their destination, explorer Ernest Shackleton and his crew found themselves in a dire situation that would play out as a two-year battle against starvation, sub-zero conditions, and the threat of being swallowed by the unforgiving Southern Ocean.

Clip.Title: THE SILK ROAD
Clip.Episode: The Flame and Cross: The South Caucasus
Clip.EpisodeSummary: 25 years after first filming the route, the original film crew returns to the region for a modern look.
